com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures

Interface IGestureDeviceManager


  • public interface IGestureDeviceManager
    The Interface IGestureDeviceManager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCameraGestureSupported()
      Checks if camera gestures is available on the system.
      boolean isOverlayServiceAvailable()
      Checks if overlay service available.
      void setEngagementListener(EngagementListener listener)
      Sets the engagement listener.
      void setHandDetectionListener(HandDetectionListener listener)
      Sets the hand detection listener.
      void setMode(GestureMode mode)
      Sets the mode in the GestureDevice.

      Set the default gesture overlay parameters.

      Sets the swipe listener.

    • Method Detail

      • setMode

        void setMode(GestureMode mode)
        Sets the mode in the GestureDevice.
        Parameters:
        mode - The tracking mode to set.

      • setOverlayPreferences

        void setOverlayPreferences(OverlayPreferences overlayPrefs)
        Set the default gesture overlay parameters.
        Parameters:
        overlayPrefs - The Overlay Preferences for visual feedback.

      • setSwipeListener

        void setSwipeListener(SwipeListener listener)
        Sets the swipe listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback for Swipe Events.

      • setEngagementListener

        void setEngagementListener(EngagementListener listener)
        Sets the engagement listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback for Engagement events.

      • setHandDetectionListener

        void setHandDetectionListener(HandDetectionListener listener)
        Sets the hand detection listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback for HandDetection events.

      • isOverlayServiceAvailable

        boolean isOverlayServiceAvailable()
        Checks if overlay service available.
        Returns:
        true, if is overlay service available

      • isCameraGestureSupported

        boolean isCameraGestureSupported()
        Checks if camera gestures is available on the system.
        Returns:
        true, if is available
